description: Stainless steel jewelry does not tarnish and oxidize, which can last longer than other jewelries. It is able to endure a lot of wear and tear. It is amazingly hypoallergenic. This necklace is constructed of premium 316l stainless steel. A indian chief skull pendant with oxidized detail hangs from an 24-inch cable chain that secures with a spring ring clasp to complete the design. Got here a stainless steel jewelry that will last for many years.

Stainless Steel Jewelry Maintenance Tips 1. Stainless steel jewelry cleaning: Your stainless steel jewelry requires no complicated cleaning or maintenance procedures. To make a cleaning solution for stainless steel jewelry, wipe them with soft wet cloth, simply mixing warm water with a few drops of mild soap. 2. Stainless Steel Jewelry Care Tips: Keep your stainless steel necklace away from harsh chemicals. Avoid your necklace impacting on any hard substances. When taking off stainless steel necklace, you can place it inside the box or velvet bag.
